law.catch_line: Contributions By Commonwealth; Application To Indebtedness
law.text: Any sums allotted and paid by the commonwealth to a city, town or district as a contribution towards the cost of a useful public works project, the stateâ€™s share of the cost of which project was financed from the proceeds of a loan issued by such city, town or district, shall be applied towards the payment of such indebtedness.
